description: HighResMIP specifies a suite of historical, future scenario and idealised experiments to be simulated on models at both high and standard resolution.
keywords: high resolution, amip, coupled, historical, scenario,
label: HighResMIP
rationale: Assessing the robustness of improvements in the representation of important climate processes with weather-resolving global model resolutions (∼ 25 km or finer), within a simplified framework using the physical climate system only with constrained aerosol forcing.
